title: Avasle Security & Antivirus 5.6.1
description:
From Google Play Store:

Avast Mobile Security for Android scans and secures against infected files, unwanted privacy phishing, malware, spyware, and malicious viruses such as trojans. This newest version contains features previously reserved for subscribers but is now completely FREE!

MOBILE SECURITY FOR ANDROID

â–  Antivirus Engine: Virus and malware scanner automatically scans for infected apps, Trojans and new apps for safety upon first use. Includes Web & file scanning for complete mobile protection, and also protects against spyware and viruses.

â–  App Permissions: Provides insights about installed apps and helps you understand your appsâ€™ access rights, ad network integrations, and permissions.

â–  Call Blocker: Keep your privacy. Add phone numbers to your blacklist and block callers you donâ€™t want to contact you.

â–  Web Shield: Scans and blocks malware-infected links, as well as trojans, adware, and spyware (for privacy and safe Web browsing) and even USSD numbers (which have the ability to wipe your device's memory). Also fixes mistyped URLs.
